After local youth Abdel is beaten unconscious by police, a riot ensues on his estate during which a policeman loses his gun. 
The gun is found by Vinz who threatens he will kill a cop if Abdel dies.

Source: Criterion C. BD (AVC @27.0 MBps) + EUR BD for tracks & extras
Released------ 2014/03/07
Format-------- Matroska/h264
File size----- 11.1 GB
Length-------- 1:37:51
Video Bit rate 14.5 MBps
Display AR---- 1920/1040
Frame rate---- 23.976 fps
Audio--------- FRENCH DTS 5.1 @1500 24bit
Optional (separate) DTS 5.1 @1500 24bit: GER, SPA / DD-5.1 @384 HUN / Dir Comm AAC in "extras" folder
Subs: En, Ara, Bul, Cro, Cze, Dan, Dut, Est, Fin, Fre sdh, Ger, Gre, Hun, Ind, It, Jap, Nor, Pol, Por br & eu, Rom, Rus, Slv, Spa eu & la, Srp, Swe, Tur, Ukr
Screens------ <a href=" http://imgbox.com/g/SOpOFRBSll" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://imgbox.com/g/SOpOFRBSll</a>
Encoder------- HighCode

EXTRAS (720p, DD-2.0 @192, EngSubs for the FRE tracks):
Dir Commentary (ENG) 10 years after the making of Hate
Introduction with Jodie Foster (14m53s, ENG)
Preparation for the Shoot (5m57s, FRE, EngSub)
Social Dynamite (34m02s, ENG)
Ten Years of La Haine (1H23m30s, FRE, EngSub)
The Making of a Scene (6m38s, FRE, EngSub)

Notes:
I recommend MPC (http://www.codecguide.com/download_kl.htm) to play, the external audio tracks will automatically be recognized by the player.
If you intend to use other player you need to mux (add) the audio in mkv with mkvmerge (http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MoKgVm2DVD).
I didn't mux the optional audios in mkv for two reasons:
-Most people don't want them so they'll save 2.3 GB.
-Some would like to download only the optional audio to use it for an other release.
Please don't ever use VLC player for my releases, in fact for any HD content, if you want quality playback.

If you want to use a track (audio or sub) for a non-Criterion version you need to add -18400 ms delay (make about 18 and half seconds earlier).
Use delaycut (http://www.videohelp.com/tools/delaycut) for delaying audio and
Subtitle Edit (http://www.videohelp.com/tools/Subtitle-Edit) for subs.

You can easily slip from download (in utorrent) the files you don't want by clicking on Files/right-click on the files and select "Don't Download".
Thanks to all of you who keep seeding for as long as possible.

I recommend also "Dobermann 1997 BDRip 1080p DTS multisub Score-HighCode", an other Crime-Masterpiece a la carte!
